Package core

Class SimScenario

java.lang.Object
core.SimScenario
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SimScenario extends Object implements Serializable
A simulation scenario used for getting and storing the settings of a simulation run.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form
